description: --- language: - es tags: - sentiment-analysis --- # Sentiment Analysis in Spanish ## beto-sentiment-analysis **NOTE: this model will be removed soon -- use pysentimiento/robertuito-sentiment-analysis instead** Repository: Model trained with TASS 2020 corpus (around ~5k tweets) of several dialects of Spanish. Base model is BETO, a BERT model trained in Spanish. Uses , , labels. ## License is an open-source library for non-commercial use and scientific research purposes only. model_explanation_gemini: Classifies sentiment in Spanish tweets using BETO (a Spanish BERT model) with labels for positive, negative, and neutral sentiments.
